messages.subject: NOT Just a vent, an idea!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/17/03 10:26:34 PM, windystreet@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/17/03 10:26:34 PM, windystreet@... writes:

<< I hate this! First of all they are getting ready to move and the mom
had already told me that they would be stopping the school at home
bull. Second, we hardly ever get to see them anymore because they do
school at home and are getting ready to move. >>

There have been a couple of times when I've protested cancellations like
this. Once for the boys and once for Holly. What I said was "Holly has been
really looking forward to this, and it seems unfair to punish her too." Or
appropriate other names.

Maybe you should do that. Worst that could happen would be the other family
would keep as is. BEST is they would go AND change.

Sandra
